roleset.name: the cry of a sheep or goat, or an imitation of that sound
roleset.note: BLEAT-V NOTES: Framed by Perryn. (from bleat.01-v)

example.name: Sheep
example.text: In the field, the sheep bleated happily as they grazed.

roleset.name: move while making a bleating sound
roleset.note: BLEAT-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from bleat.02-v)

role.descr: Thing making bleating sound while in motion

example.name: All arguments
example.text: *PRO* caught tight between two tractor trailers howling, bleating down some steep pass somewhere in Southern Oregon.
example.arg: down some steep pass somewhere in Southern Oregon

roleset.name: whine
roleset.note: BLEAT-V NOTES: Framed by Katie. (from bleat.03-v)

example.name: complain about
example.text: A bunch of journos were bleating on that we should condemn all the hard working journalistsat News International just because a whole bunch of hacks at the Sun were arrested.
example.arg: that we shouldn't condemn all the hard working journalists at News International just because a whole bunch of hacks at the Sun were arrested.
